src_original: sattāsvabhāvaś cet* hetuḥ na sattā sādhyate /  kathaṃ sādhyāpi syāt* /
atha mataṃ sattāsāmānye sādhye siddhasādhyatā syād ataḥ sattāviśeṣaḥ sādhyas tasmiṃś ca sādhye ///
3 /// .. .. dṛṣṭāntaḥ / syād ato na sattā sādhyate /
tadā hetāv api satve viśeṣasyānanvayāt sādhanaśūnyo dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt* tad āhānanvayo hītyādi /
hetusādhayor iti saptamīdvivacanaṃ /  hetau sādhye cety arthaḥ /  anyatra cānātmādau /
kilaśabdo 'nabhimatadyotakaḥ evaṃ prasādhyamānam iti asti pradhānam ityādinā pradhānādi ///  4 /// sādhayituṃ śakyate /  kasmāt tasya viśeṣasyānanvayāt* /
